description: Workers are suspended after waste water, said to contain heavy metals, was pumped into the wilderness.
title: Nornickel: Russia probes new pollution at Arctic mining firm
title_page: Nornickel: Russia probes new pollution at Arctic mining firm - BBC News
maintext: According to Nornickel, the waste water does not contain toxic tailings from its mining operation. The firm says the "purified" water had been pumped away from the reservoir to prevent overspill, while admitting that it was not acceptable practice.
